Component & modal payload extraction helpers.

These procs extract data from message-component and modal-submit interactions. They complement the slash argument helpers in slashargs by covering buttons, select menus, and modals.

Quick reference

ProcReturns
customIdOption[string] â€” the custom_id field
selectValuesseq[string] â€” selected values from a select menu
modalValuesTable[string, string] â€” all text-input fields
modalValueOption[string] â€” one text-input field by id

Example: modal handler

handler.addModal("feedback_form") do:
  let vals = i.modalValues
  let name = i.modalValue("name_field").get("anonymous")
  await handler.reply(i, "Thanks, " & name & "!")

Example: select handler

handler.addSelect("role_picker") do:
  let picked = i.selectValues
  await handler.reply(i, "You chose: " & picked.join(", "))

Procs

proc customId(i: Interaction): Option[string] {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}

Returns the custom_id attached to a message-component or modal-submit interaction.

For application-command or ping interactions the result is none. The returned value is the same string you specified when sending the button, select menu, or modal.

proc modalValue(i: Interaction; fieldCustomId: string): Option[string] {.
    ...raises: [KeyError], tags: [], forbids: [].}

Returns a single modal text-input value by its custom_id.

This is a convenience wrapper around modalValues for when you only need one field. Returns none when the field is missing or the interaction is not a modal submit.

let email = i.modalValue("email_field").get("not provided")
proc modalValues(i: Interaction): Table[string, string] {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}

Extracts all text-input values from a modal-submit interaction as a Table[string, string] keyed by each field's custom_id.

Returns an empty table for non-modal interactions.

handler.addModal("survey") do:
  let fields = i.modalValues
  for id, value in fields:
    echo id, " = ", value
proc selectValues(i: Interaction): seq[string] {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}

Returns the values the user picked in a select-menu component.

Supports all select variants: mctSelectMenu (string select), mctUserSelect, mctRoleSelect, mctMentionableSelect, and mctChannelSelect. Returns an empty seq for non-select interactions.
